revised_title: British Freshwater Phytoplankton: A Focus on Desmid-Plankton and Distribution
tldr: The authors conducted extensive research on the phytoplankton of British freshwater lakes, focusing on the desmid-plankton. They discovered that the lakes of the western British areas have the highest number and variety of species. The study provides a summary of the findings and comparisons between the British phytoplankton and that of continental Europe and other regions.
